t: What Is Amazon Bedrock? | The Motley Fool
s: August 9, 2024 - The goal of Amazon Bedrock is to make it as easy as possible for developers to build and deploy generative AI applications. It does this by offering foundational models -- the large language models (LLMs) built by other companies -- to serve as the backbone of a new application.
